title: Homepage Load and Element Visibility
description: Verify the homepage loads successfully and all key elements (hero carousel, category navigation, flash deals, trending products, testimonials, newsletter subscription) are visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check the hero carousel is displayed and cycles through images
Verify category navigation links are visible and clickable
Ensure flash deals section is visible with correct products
Confirm trending and curated product sections display products correctly
Check testimonials carousel shows user reviews
Validate newsletter subscription input and submit button are present

title: Product Catalog Filtering and Pagination
description: Validate product listing supports filters, sorting, and pagination, and that filtered results update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the product catalog page
Apply a category filter and verify products shown belong to that category
Apply a price range filter and verify product prices fall within it
Use sorting options (e.g., price ascending, popularity) and verify order changes accordingly
Navigate through pagination controls and confirm product lists update
Check product count matches filtered criteria and pagination info is accurate

title: Product Detail View and Variant Selection
description: Ensure product detail pages display images, descriptions, variants, reviews with verified badges, and recommendations. Adding variants to cart works correctly.

steps.description: Open a product detail page via product catalog
Verify image gallery loads with all product images
Check product information (title, description, price) is correctly displayed
Select different product variants (e.g., color, size)
Confirm variant-specific information and price updates
Verify product reviews display, including 'verified purchase' badges
Check recommended products section shows related items
Add selected variant to shopping cart
Confirm item is added to cart with correct variant and quantity

title: User Registration and Login with Better Auth
description: Test user registration and login flows including email/password and Google OAuth with session management using Better Auth and Redis caching.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page
Register a new user with valid email and password
Verify registration confirmation is displayed and email verification sent
Log out if logged in
Navigate to login page
Login with valid credentials
Confirm user is successfully logged in and redirected to appropriate page
Logout user
Login using Google OAuth option
Verify successful OAuth login and session creation
Check session persistence across pages and expiration after logout

title: Add to Cart, Update Quantity, and Remove Items
description: Verify users can add products to cart, update quantities, remove items, and that cart state is persisted and consistent using Zustand store.

steps.description: From product detail, add a product to cart
Confirm cart icon increments item count
Navigate to shopping cart page
Verify added product details and quantity display
Update quantity to a new valid value
Check price calculations update accordingly
Remove an item from the cart
Validate cart updates and removal reflected in UI and state
Reload or revisit site and verify cart state persists

title: Multi-step Checkout Flow with Stripe Payment
description: Test full checkout workflow including shipping info input, shipping option selection, payment via Stripe, order confirmation, and webhook processing for status updates.

steps.description: Navigate to checkout page with items in cart
Fill in shipping address form with valid data
Verify shipping options load and default selection appears
Select a shipping option
Enter payment details using test Stripe cards
Submit payment and place order
Confirm order confirmation screen with order summary is displayed
Simulate Stripe webhook event for payment confirmation
Verify order status updates to 'paid' and user receives notification

title: User Account Dashboard Management
description: Verify authenticated users can access account dashboard to view order history, update profile, manage addresses, wishlist, and logout.

steps.description: Login as a registered user
Navigate to user account dashboard
Check order history lists previous orders with details
Edit profile information and save changes
Confirm profile updates persist after reload
Add and remove addresses in the address management section
Ensure addresses update correctly in user profile
Add items to wishlist and remove them
Validate wishlist state updates and persists across sessions

title: Global Search with Autocomplete and Multi-tab Results
description: Validate that global search with autocomplete returns relevant product and category results, supports multi-tab viewing, and handles no matches gracefully.

steps.description: Focus on the global search bar in header
Type partial product name and observe autocomplete suggestions
Check product and category suggestions appear correctly with highlighting
Select autocomplete suggestion to navigate to detail page
Perform search and verify results show in multi-tab layout for products and categories
Verify that results in each tab are relevant and sortable
Input gibberish to test no-match scenario
Confirm user-friendly message displays for no results

title: Admin Panel Product CRUD and Role-based Access
description: Test that admin users with appropriate permissions can create, read, update, and delete products; and verify unauthorized users are blocked.

steps.description: Login as admin user with product management permissions
Navigate to Products section in admin panel
Create a new product with all required fields and submit
Confirm product appears in product listing with correct details
Edit an existing product's details and save changes
Verify changes reflect in product details and listings
Delete a product and confirm removal from list
Ensure deletion is logged in audit trail
Login as a non-admin or a user with no product permissions
Attempt to access product management routes
Verify access is denied and proper error message is shown

title: Cache Invalidation and ISR Revalidation on Data Changes
description: Verify that changes to product, category, or promotional data trigger appropriate Redis cache invalidation and Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR) to update frontend content.

steps.description: Make a change to product details via admin API or panel
Confirm Redis cache keys related to the product are invalidated
Verify that ISR revalidation triggers and updated data appears on subsequent frontend requests
Update category hierarchy or promotions
Validate cache invalidation and ISR revalidation for affected pages

title: Promo Codes Application and Validation
description: Test creation, application, and validation of promo codes during checkout including edge cases for expiry, usage limits, and incompatible discounts.

steps.description: Create promo code in admin panel with specific discount and constraints
Add products to cart and proceed to checkout
Apply the promo code in checkout payment step
Verify that discount is applied correctly to order summary
Attempt to apply an expired promo code
Confirm appropriate error message is shown and discount not applied
Apply promo code exceeding usage limits or incompatible with current cart
Ensure promo code application is rejected with meaningful feedback

title: Real-time Notifications in Admin Panel
description: Verify that admin users receive real-time notifications for order updates, critical system alerts, and marketing campaign metrics.

steps.description: Login as an admin user
Trigger events that emit notifications (e.g., order placed, payment confirmed)
Verify notifications appear in admin UI in real-time without page refresh
Acknowledge/dismiss a notification
Confirm notification is removed or marked as read
Trigger email/SMS marketing campaign event
Check that related notification with campaign metrics is displayed

title: Accessibility Compliance for Key UI Elements
description: Validate that homepage, product catalog, product detail, and checkout UI components meet WCAG AA accessibility standards including keyboard navigation and screen reader compatibility.

steps.description: Navigate to homepage, product catalog, product detail, and checkout pages
Verify all interactive elements are reachable and operable via keyboard only
Check presence of appropriate ARIA roles and labels
Use screen reader to confirm meaningful descriptions and navigation flow
Confirm color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA requirements across UI

title: API Endpoint Pagination, Filtering, and Sorting
description: Test REST API endpoints for products, categories, and orders support pagination, filtering, and sorting according to specification with correct responses and error handling.

steps.description: Send GET requests to products API with pagination parameters and validate page size and total counts
Apply filters (e.g., category, price range) and verify filtered results
Use sorting parameters (e.g., price ascending) and validate order in response
Send invalid or malformed query parameters
Confirm API returns appropriate error codes and messages

title: Audit Logging for Admin Actions
description: Verify that all significant admin operations (create, update, delete) are recorded in audit logs with accurate timestamps, user identity, and action details.

steps.description: Login as admin user and perform product creation
Make updates to categories and users
Delete orders and promo codes
Check audit log entries exist for each action with correct metadata
Verify unauthorized users cannot access audit logs

title: Wishlist Add and Remove with Persistence
description: Ensure users can add products to the wishlist, remove them, and that the wishlist persists across sessions using Zustand state management.

steps.description: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to product detail and add product to wishlist
Confirm wishlist count and item presence updated in UI
Remove product from wishlist
Verify product is removed and UI updates accordingly
Logout and login again
Confirm wishlist contents persist correctly

title: Product Review Submission and Verification
description: Test product review functionality including review submission from verified purchasers, display of verified badges, and review listing on product pages.

steps.description: Login as a user who purchased a product
Navigate to product detail page and submit a new review with rating and comment
Verify review appears in reviews section with 'verified purchase' badge
Attempt to submit a review as unverified user
Confirm submission is blocked or review unverified badge is shown
Check review sorting and pagination on product detail page

title: Responsive UI Across Desktop and Mobile Devices
description: Verify key UI components including homepage, catalog, product detail, cart, checkout, and admin panel render correctly and remain usable on various viewport sizes including mobile, tablet, and desktop.

steps.description: Open website on desktop resolution
Confirm layout elements align and all content is visible
Resize viewport or open site on tablet resolution
Ensure navigation menus adapt to touch and smaller widths
Open site on mobile viewport/device
Verify hamburger menu, collapsible sections, and full functionality with no clipping or overflow

title: Order Creation and Status Update via API and Webhooks
description: Verify orders are created successfully via checkout API, payment status updates via Stripe webhooks, and resulting state updates propagate in admin and user views.

steps.description: Submit order creation request through checkout API with valid payment method
Confirm order is created with status pending
Simulate Stripe payment success webhook call
Verify order status changes to paid in database and UI
Confirm notification sent to user and visible in admin panel
Simulate payment failure webhook and verify order status changes accordingly

title: Security Enforcement on Protected Routes and APIs
description: Test all protected frontend routes and backend API endpoints enforce authentication and authorization according to user role and permissions, and reject unauthorized access.

steps.description: Access admin panel routes without login
Verify redirection to login or access denied
Login as user without admin privileges and access admin routes
Confirm access is denied or forbidden message shown
Access protected API endpoints without token or invalid token
Ensure 401 Unauthorized or 403 Forbidden responses received
Login with valid user and access permitted endpoints
Confirm successful data access and operations permitted by role
